description: Retrieves the criteria and other settings for a findings filter.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Amazon Macie resource that the request applies to.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action that's performed on findings that match the filter criteria (findingCriteria). Possible values are: ARCHIVE, suppress (automatically archive) the findings; and, NOOP, don't perform any action on the findings.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the filter.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The custom description of the filter.

nested_items.name: findingCriteria
nested_items.description: The criteria that's used to filter findings.

nested_items.name: criterion
nested_items.description: A condition that specifies the property, operator, and one or more values to use to filter the results.

nested_items.name: eq
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: eq
nested_items.description: The value for the property matches (equals) the specified value. If you specify multiple values, Macie uses OR logic to join the values.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: eqExactMatch
nested_items.description: The value for the property exclusively matches (equals an exact match for) all the specified values. If you specify multiple values, Amazon Macie uses AND logic to join the values.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: gt
nested_items.description: The value for the property is greater than the specified value.

nested_items.name: gte
nested_items.description: The value for the property is greater than or equal to the specified value.

nested_items.name: lt
nested_items.description: The value for the property is less than the specified value.

nested_items.name: lte
nested_items.description: The value for the property is less than or equal to the specified value.

nested_items.name: neq
nested_items.description: The value for the property doesn't match (doesn't equal) the specified value. If you specify multiple values, Macie uses OR logic to join the values.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the filter.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The custom name of the filter.

nested_items.name: position
nested_items.description: The position of the filter in the list of saved filters on the Amazon Macie console. This value also determines the order in which the filter is applied to findings, relative to other filters that are also applied to the findings.
(string) ---
(string) ---
